title: Checklist
claimCheckListTitle: You’ll have the opportunity to provide detailed information about the claim, but you might want to have the minimum required information to hand:
claimCheckListItem1: Online case reference number provided by HMCTS
claimCheckListItem2: The name of respondent (you or the person you’re responding for)
claimCheckListItem3: Name of the claimant provided by HMCTS
claimCheckListReminder: You do not have to complete your response in one session. You can save your progress and return to the response form at any time before submitting.
